quality_issues: Distracting background elements (other furniture, busy setting)
Shadows on the floor creating uneven lighting
Product is not centered, and parts are cut off (bottom left corner)
The environment looks like a showroom, not a natural home setting for lifestyle shots
data.notes: The sofa is a modern two-seater with button-tufted back cushions and clean lines. The fabric has a subtle texture. For e-commerce, it would benefit from a clean studio background or a well-styled living room scene with balanced, soft lighting to accurately represent its color and style.
